EASTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
SOUTH AFRICA.
DNC 01.
1. UNDERWATER OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL FURTHER
   NOTICE BY:
   A. M/V GARIEP IN 28-39.5S 015-52.3E.
   B. M/V CORAL SEA IN 28-32.1S 015-49.1E.
   C. M/V MATHILDA GEM IN 28-43.4S 016-29.8E.
   D. M/V YA TOIVO IN 28-59.0S 015-01.0E.
   TWO MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 964/22.
